[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Offer” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_image=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Mount-Rushmore-Yellowstone-Cover-Web.jpg” custom_padding=”80px||80px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” custom_padding_phone=”” filter_saturate=”95%” filter_brightness=”106%” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Title” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” min_height=”auto” sticky_enabled=”0″]

MOUNT RUSHMORE – YELLOWSTONE

6 DAYS/5 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_padding=”38px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”-31px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”30px|0px|21px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” min_height=”auto” sticky_enabled=”0″]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”0px|0px|26px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”81px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”0px||3px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01: ARRIVAL AT JACKSON, WYOMING

Arrive in Jackson Hole Airport. You will be transferred to the hotel.

Overnight at Jackson Hole.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ inline_fonts=”Oswald” min_height=”auto” sticky_enabled=”0″]

DAY 02: YELLOWSTONE NATIONAL PARK

Breakfast at the hotel.

Wait in the lobby for pickup for your Yellowstone Park Tour. On this unforgettable full day tour from Jackson Hole to Yellowstone, you’ll experience the beauty that led to this becoming America’s first national park. Get epic views of geysers, canyons, waterfalls, rivers, and wildlife, and see Yellowstone highlights like Old Faithful and the historic Lake Hotel. On this Yellowstone tour from Jackson Hole, learn the area’s volcanic geology and unique level of ecology. Keep your eyes peeled for Yellowstone wildlife, including bison and wolves.

Watch the eruption of Old Faithful and admire the amazing colors of the Fountain Paint Pot Stand in awe of the towering waterfall at the Grand Canyon of Yellowstone Visit the historic Lake Hotel overlooking the country’s largest lake above 7,000 feet! Stop to view-wildlife.

After tour, return to hotel. Overnight at Jackson Hole.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”118px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”||4px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 03: GRAND TETON NATIONAL PARK

Breakfast at the hotel

Wait in the lobby for your West Yellowstone tour (Upper loop). On this Grand Teton day trip from Jackson Hole, experience one of America’s most astounding landscapes from the comfort of a coach vehicle.  In between views of the jagged Teton Range and a visit to the shores of Jenny Lake.

You will learn the geology and history of the Tetons from your knowledgeable local guide. You’ll also visit Menors Ferry and Chapel of the Transfiguration; both are on the US National Register of Historic Places.

After tour return to the hotel.

Overnight at Jackson Hole.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”138px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||false|” custom_padding=”5px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 04: RAPID CITY

Breakfast at the hotel

Proceed to do the check-out. Wait in the lobby to be transferred to Jackson Hole Airport, for your flight to Rapid City, South Dakota.  

Arrive into Rapid City, transfer to the hotel.

Overnight in Rapid City.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”385px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”10px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 05: RAPID CITY TOUR WITH CLUSTER STATE PARK

Breakfast at the hotel

Proceed to nearby Fort Hayes Chuckwagon for pickup of Mt Rushmore tour.

You will see the most important sites while visiting Rapid City. On this tour which departs mid-morning and winds its way along scenic highways visiting attractions like Mount Rushmore National Monument, Custer State Park, Needles Highway and Crazy Horse Memorial.

Our knowledgeable tour guide drives you through 100 miles of the Black Hills National Forest stopping for pictures of wildlife and endless picturesque moments. The tour returns to Fort Hays where you’ll have the opportunity to visit the Fort Hays working-functioning Old West Town Square again for anything you may have missed before the tour.

Return to hotel after tour.

Overnight in Rapid City.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ inline_fonts=”Arial,Oswald,Georgia” min_height=”auto” sticky_enabled=”0″]

DAY 06: DEPARTURE FROM RAPID CITY

Breakfast at the Hotel

Check out of the hotel and transfer to the airport for your flight to the next destination/home.

HAVE A SAFE TRIP!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”More Places” _builder_version=”3.0.76″ min_height=”873px” custom_margin=”-3px||-147px|||” custom_padding=”0||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” custom_padding_phone=”” global_module=”117″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ min_height=”0px” custom_margin=”-2px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”1px|0px||0px||”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb url=”http://www.facebook.com/pages/Discover-Destinations/156630901051625″ use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%291%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ _builder_version=”3.15″]
